component.text: If the default gateway was not configured on S1, response packets from S1 would not be able to reach the administrator at 192.168.11.10. The administrator would not be able to manage the device remotely.

component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command. Commands that include a name or password are case-sensitive.***
component.existingcommands: Enter global configuration and configure '192.168.10.1' as the default gateway for S1.

command.deviceresponse: <font size='10'>Enter configuration commands, one per line. End with CNTL/Z.</font>

command.instruction: You successfully configured the default gateway on S1.
